entities.description: The method of using heroin, such as smoking, sniffing, or injecting.
The history of heroin use, including whether someone has ever used heroin.
The period since last using a needle to inject heroin.
The history of methamphetamine use, including whether someone has ever used methamphetamine.
The period since last using a needle to inject methamphetamine.

relationships.description: Relates the respondent to the method they used for heroin.
Indicates whether the respondent has a history of using heroin.
Indicates the period since the respondent last used a needle to inject heroin.
Indicates whether the respondent has a history of using methamphetamine.
Indicates the period since the respondent last used a needle to inject methamphetamine.
